name: Beau - Israel's PC Doctor
tag_list: pc, laptop, networking, peripherals, accessories, repair, support, troubleshoot, training, windows, software, hardware, israel, raanana, jerusalem, haifa, tel-aviv, ashdod, netanya
overview:
Beau - Israel’s PC Doctor provides onsite & remote PC and networking repair, maintenance, support , and training throughout Israel and comprehensive remote services globally.

Israel’s PC Doctor serves home/consumer clients and small businesses, providing full hardware & software repair, maintenance, support, training, & instruction, as well as data security and data backup/restoration and recovery solutions.

Partial List of Services:

  • Windows/Office Repairs, Installations or Re-installations
  • Virus/Malware Removal, Protection & Security
  • Data Backup, Storage, Recovery Solutions
  • Routine Maintenance & Emergency Repair Service
  • Internet Modem/Router/VoIP/Network Setup & Configuration
  • Training & Instruction in All Areas of Computing
  • Full Featured 24/7 Remote Support & Assistance
  • Hardware Diagnostics, Repair, or Replacement as Needed
  • Desktops, Laptops, Webcams, Printers, Scanners, Audio Devices, PDAs, & all Peripherals Installed & Configured

Testimonials: http://www.tinyurl.com/PcDocTestimonials

Online Computer Support forum here: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/IsraelPCdoctor/
